description: 3.3  first ODI wicket! pitched up and angling in, Dhoni plays all over it and gets bowled, India in trouble here!  22/2

11.5  and the procession continues! short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Dhoni stays back and slashes at it, ball clips the outside edge and goes straight to the keeper, second wicket for Adams  43/7
49.3  Ireland to Dhoni, OUT (Caught), pitched up, Dhoni tries to hit but straight to long-off fielder  224/5

43.5  Styris to Dhoni, gone! good ball pitched outside off stump, goes for a pull on the front foot, misses it, gets hit on the pad, loud shout, given by Umpire Barbour, Dhoni was unlucky there, the height was the problem.  230/6
47.2  gone! Dhoni is outdone by a cunning change of pace, ball goes high up towards mid-off, Jayawardene moves across and takes a fantastic diving catch - Fernando gets one to his name  316/5

33.5  OUT! fraction short outside off stump, Dhoni goes back and cuts it away flat in the air to backward point, Shoaib Malik takes a blinder diving to his left, very good catch to give an important breakthrough  225/3
45.5  gone! Short ball outside off and Dhoni can only cut that to Collingwood at backward point, Plunkett gets a wicket and Dhoni's unusual innings comes to an end, India eight down now!  201/8

45.4  gone! good length delivery, cutting in from outside the off stump, Dhoni gets nowhere with a wild swing, ball clips the inside edge and crashes into the stumps, Flintoff strikes, this match is not over yet!  210/6
38.1  Gone! slower delivery and short on the off stump, Dhoni moves back and looks to turn it away onside, beaten by the slowness and scoops to Solanki to mid-wicket  186/6

41.4  bowled'm! excellent yoker on the stumps, surprise delivery, Dhoni frantically jams his bat down but the ball sneaks through and crashes into the stumps, what a wicket! - Malik rewarded for some wonderful bowling.   149/6

45.5  Rana strikes! another well disguised slower delivery, pitched on middle and off and cutting in, Dhoni is early into the shot and the ball goes past the bat, clips the pad and crashes into the stumps, big wicket!   234/3

42.3  gone! Game on folks! Full-length delivery on the middle stump, Dhoni again takes his left foot just outside the line and whacks it towards long-on. It flew straight to the fielder there. Don't go anywhere!  233/5

37.3  and he does it! short of a good length delivery, close to the off stump and cutting in, Dhoni cuts off the back-foot with no real foot-work, ball clips the inside edge and crashes into the woodwork, Taylor pulls out a rabbit and the crowd goes wild - what a wicket!  130/6

37.1  Dhoni drives a full one hard towards Gayle who dives and half stops the ball. The batsmen set off for a quick single. Gayle recovers quickly, scoops up the ball and fires the throw in on the stumps. Dhoni is a bit lax getting back and could be in trouble. Bucknor refers it to the third umpire and after many replays the decision, a close one, is that Dhoni is short of his crease!  210/4

6.1  good length delivery outside the off stump, a fairly harmless ball, Dhoni leans back and comes down hard on it, ball clips the inside edge and crashes into the stumps - it's that maan Hinds again!  26/2

40.4  and he's bowled! Like the one to Sehwag, this one just shoots under his bat and hits the base of middle and off, he just could not adjust to that one, can't blame him too, India have lost their fourth wicket, Taylor picks up another  227/4

15.2  The three-fingered celebratory salute is on show! Collymore takes out Dhoni. Full, straight and Dhoni throws his bat at it. But the ball evades the flashing blade and crashes into the stumps. To say that India is in some trouble would be a understatement.  69/5

36.2  caught on the fence! crucial blow that! banged in short outside off stump, Dhoni flat bats it and tries to clear the cover fence, however he doesn't succede and hits it straight to Martyn on the fence  158/6

26.3  that's the end of that! another wild swing and this time the ball goes low towards midwicket, Collingwood dives forward and takes a fantastic low catch, Dhoni gave it everything but failed to get under the ball  119/5

49.5  driven down the ground again and Dhoni again calls for two, this time the throw from the deep is an accurate one, Baugh breaks the stumps at the striker's end and Dhoni is millimetres short  223/8
49.6  Bowden has given him out!  There was an huge inside-edge. Attempted yorker turns into a low full-toss and Dhoni tries to send it over midwicket, gets an edge onto his pads.  249/8

22.6  Nel hammers in another nail - slightly short and cutting in sharply, Dhoni was all set to leave it through to the keeper but the ball kept coming in with the angle, and in the end the ball brushed the glove and went straight to the keeper  83/6
44.1  bowled from round the wicket - punched off the back-foot to the point region  198/7

19.5  Gone..Dhoni falls slashing straight to thirdman. Short of length, outside the offstump, Dhoni hops back and upper-cuts it, ala Sehwag, over the slips and it flies high and straight to Prince.  82/5

47.5  Et tu, Nel ! short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line - Dhoni swings across the line and the ball steeples towards wide long-on. Nel sprints in from the deep, throws himself full length to his left and takes a two handed blinder.  183/8

21.2  gone! Another soft dismissal! Wasnt the greatest ball, slow on a full length just on off stump, Dhoni gets half-forward and plays with an angled bat, just closing the face of the bat, and scoops it back off the leading edge to Smith for a simple caught-and-bowled  66/5

49.5  stunning, simply stunning, Dhoni had room to free his arms and he smashed that  high over cover, Maharoof ran back looking over his head, running at full speed, Upul Tharanga was running in from the fence also at full speed, there was danger of a collision but Maharoof didn't lose focus, he kept his eye on the ball and completed an outstanding catch running backwards and tumbling to the ground, one of the best catches you will see under pressure  252/9

43.5  India are in shambles, Dhoni spots a shortish delivery outside off stump, decides to cut and cuts it straight to the waiting hands of Aftab Ahmed at short third man, Bangladesh are delirious in their celebrations  159/7

38.2  Wow! what a spectacular catch! by Tucker. Dhoni had heaved away, down the ground , Tucker ran across from long-off and was still short of the falling ball when he dived and incredibly held on to the catch. Super effort  and the big wicket of Dhoni falls. He was accelerating the run rate and Bermuda have struck back.  269/4

28.1  Dhoni walks for a lbw. It was that plumb. Fab delivery. Landed on the middle stump line and hurried on straight - a stunning toppie, Dhoni had backed to cut and he had no place to hide. Tried to get his bat down in a hurry but the ball rushes on and rams the pad. Dead duck. What a bowler!  112/6

25.5  edged and gone! Rafique fires it full and wide, Dhoni makes room and cuts, getting low as sees the ball staying down too, and the under-edge is snapped up brilliantly by Rahim! Dhoni doesnt even wait for the umpire's signal, just shuts up shop and makes for the pavilion  130/2

43.4  short of a good length delivery and Harbhajan defends it down on the leg side, quick single called for but Harbhajan was not interested and Dhoni had to rush back. Fairly wide throw comes in, Odoyo dives across full length but fails to collect the ball cleanly but the ball ricochets on to the stumps and that's the end of Dhoni  279/7
23.3  cleaned 'em up! Full in the blockhole, Dhoni shapes up to twirl one through the leg side but the ball shoots under the bat and disturbs the furniture and Albie celebrates his strike  134/3

32.4  cleaned up! Ntini strikes with a full delivery outside off stump, drawing Dhoni forward and producing a false shot, a poor attempt at a drive, the ball sneaks through the big bat-and-pad gap and thuds into the base of off stump  142/4
30.3  same ball, same shot and Flintoff makes the breakthrough...bouncer gloved through to Prior and India slump further  102/5

46.6  a slow bouncer does the trick. It was banged in short and it climbed up ever so slowly, Dhoni swivelled, was made to wait before he pulled it uppishly to the right of short-fine leg where Tremlett pulled off a sharp catch  302/4

38.2  Gone! Short, a bit of width, Dhoni's eyes light up and he gets in really good position to play the cut shot. Once in position Dhoni gives it all he's got, thrashing the ball really hard. But, just like Tendulkar earlier in the day, it's neither kept down nor hit high up and travels to Paul Collingwood at a comfortable catching height, even if at scorching pace. Collingwood latches on to the chance - he's not like to miss these - and the bowling change has worked. Huge wicket for England with India still needing 92  190/5

37.4  He nags you with the mundane before surprising you with a work of art. Here is another Monty special. From round the stumps, it drifted in, landed on the middle, Dhoni leans forward, tries to guide it to third man region with an open-face of the bat but the ball evades the bat and crashes into the off stump. Monty is over the moon. He does his unique jig.  140/5

48.4  Edged and taken. That was full and outside the off, Dhoni has a hard dash at that, the ball flies off the outside edge and Matt Prior is equal to the task, diving to the right and hanging on to a sharp catch. Dhoni goes and England get some relief  311/5

47.6  bowled him - Dhoni shuffling over to off to try to sweep it round, but the ball nutmegged him and appeared to get a thin bobble off the inside of his left pad - I'll confirm after replays  294/6

47.3  good catch in the deep! Dhoni slogs a fullish delivery and mistimes it over the covers and mid-off, the ball's up in the air for some time and Anderson, moving to his left and running around from long-off, watches the ball brilliantly and times his dive to perfection, cupping his hands and holding on to end India's innings at 187  187/10
47.3  Got 'em! All over. The googly ends it all, Dhoni flashes at one outside off and the top-edge flies to short third man where Brad Hodge dived full length and completed a fine catch  222/10

35.6  edged and gone! Lee strikes in his return over, landing it on a short length and sucking Dhoni into a leaden-footed flirt outside off stump, the outside-edge snapped up by an all too happy Gilchrist as Australia break a threatening partnership  173/5

9.2  and the captain goes! Johnson bowls it down the leg side off a short length, angling it away from the right-hander and Dhoni goes for some sort of one-handed nudge off the pads, there's touch and deviation and Gilchrist takes another good catch, this time diving full length to his left and plucking it ... are India in trouble or what?  43/5

48.4  and that should be the match for Australia! Dhoni gets under a ball and hits it high in the air, Ponting runs back from mid-on and settles under the steepling catch, the crowds fall silent as the series all but slips away from India's reach  290/7

17.5  edged and gone! The thinnest of edges as Dhoni stands rooted to his crease and can't resist fishing at one angled across off stump, a pretty inoccuous delivery but Dhoni's gentle feeler only ended up in Gilchrist's safe gloves .. and thats his 400th catch in one-day cricket as India slip further  63/5

44.1  and he strikes straight away! Shoaib pitches one on a good length outside off stump, Dhoni drives away from his body and gets a thick edge through to Akmal who takes the catch this time, it was flying at considerable speed and the light isn't the best so he did well to hold on to it  225/5

42.1  One more wicket down. India have lost their seventh wicket and are in danger of being bowled out before the 50 overs. It kicked up from short of length, outside off stump, Dhoni went for a cut but was done in by the extra bounce  266/7

43.1  Cleans him up with a slower one! Full and dipping outside off stump, Dhoni was beaten by the change of pace, was caught at the crease as he tried to drive it through cover but instead, got a fatal inside-edge on to the leg stump.  229/4

37.4  Gone! And that's a second telling blow. Dhoni comes down the pitch and tries to launch the ball over midwicket. The bat face is closed a bit early and the ball goes off the leading edge and heads straight up in the air. It's a real steepler, swirling about but Nazir settles under the catch and takes it. Big wicket and with that Pakistan should have this game all but wrapped up  195/7
44.1  gone, just like that! Dhoni gets across and twirls a full delivery outside off stump straight to Ponting at extra cover, handing Lee his fourth for the evening  189/8

27.4  a very tight run-out decision coming back for the second from the drive to mid-on and given out on the line with the throw back to Sangakkara who crashes the ball on to the stumps in the nick of time  181/4

34.3  ah, a poor call! Impatiently driven into the covers, with too much bottom hand, Dhoni calls for the single but a diving, sliding Rohit is caught just short by a terrific direct hit from Hayden and Dhoni pays for that risky call  134/6
30.3  an outside edge, and gone! Good bowling change from Ponting, Dohnie prodding forward away from the body as Lee cuts in well on a good length  149/5
47.6  chipped out a full ball from in line with middle, doesn't get enough middle on it and Clarke takes a comfortable catch  240/7

41.5  trapped him in front with a full toss. Dhoni took couple of steps down the track and  tried to swing it across the line, missed, and was hit in front of middle and leg. On the back leg. Was it going down leg, though? Any way it doesn't matter. He is out.  269/5

48.2  another swing and this time he holes out to sweeper cover. Game over. Pakistan win the series. Malik rushes across and jumps at Afridi. They all converge. Now both teams shake hands with each other. Super win for Pakistan. They rebounded well after a big loss in the earlier game to win when it mattered. The Kitply cup is in the bag.  290/10
48.4  Fast full toss on the leg side. Dhoni shovels it in the air towards square leg and Sarfraz rushes on, collides with Misbah, coming in from midwicket, but manages to hold on  290/7

37.6  bowled him! Murali pitched the ball outside off stump, it was a quicker one and the ball spun into the right-hander, Dhoni tried to work the ball towards point off the back foot but it was too straight for the shot, he missed and the ball clipped the top of off stump  253/4

34.2  Sharp catch by Sanga, standing up to the stumps. Full in length outside off stump  and Dhoni went for a extra-cover drive and inside-edged to Sanga who pouched it safely. All the Sri Lankans converge near the centre pitch and are in a huddle of a joy. The game is all but over. Sri Lanka will win another Asia Cup.  160/9

27.2  caught!! Dhoni moves back and tries to cut a ball that's much too close to off stump, it turned ever so slightly away from the right-hander as well, the outside edge flies quickly to Jayawardene who takes a sharp catch at first slip  87/6

35.5  Cleaned him up with a fuller length delivery that shaped in. It came in from the full length, from the off stump line, Dhoni went for the drive and edges it to his stumps. Good innings from the captain.  135/6

48.3  Mendis' day has rapidly got better! He bowls a full and straight ball, Dhoni charges down the track and tries to hit him over the off side, he doesn't get any elevation and hits the ball flat and low towards Jayawardene who tumbles forward while taking the catch at cover  229/8

42.4  Jayasuriya takes a very good catch at covers to end the captain's knock. It was full and well outside off, Dhoni crouched on a bent knee, reached out to drive and Jayasuriya timed his lunge to his left well and pouched it safely. Two new batsmen at the crease  232/5

19.3  bowled him! That's the end of Dhoni! They are dancing in the stands! Fernando bowled one full and fast, swinging into the right-hander, Dhoni hardly moved his feet as he tried to play across the line, the ball slipped through the gap between bat and pad and crashed into the stumps  85/6
47.1  cleaned up. Full, straight, on the middle, Dhoni shapes to whip it across the line, misses and the middle stump is knocked back.  352/5
38.6  temporary respite for England, Dhoni tries to improvise by glancing to third man with very little room outside the off stump, the offcutter nips back in and shaves the off stump  206/5

21.5  timber! Patel gets a wicket with his fifth delivery, a full and flat yorker which hits the base of leg stump after Dhoni backs away and plays another of those whips to leg, thats just reward for whats been an excellent final over, a great way to keep these two batsmen quite at the death  160/4
40.6  Dhoni's gone, trapped lbw, dances down the track, and looks to hoick him over midwicket, misses the ball completely, rapped on the pads, and the umpire gives it  250/4

44.3  Dhoni walks!! That was bowled outside leg stump and Dhoni tried to glance it down fine, got a faint tickle to the keeper which the umpire failed to spot. Dhoni, though, set off for the pavilion immediately and Brian Jerling gave the nod seeing him go  223/7

33.3  gone! finally! Dhoni had made up his mind to go after Jayasuriya, came down the track to smash it over long-on, got a thick outside edge and Dilhara Fernando took a couple of steps backwards at point to take a well judged one-handed catch  202/2
36.1  Dhoni tries to take Jayasuriya downtown but he fails to get the elevation, he gives him he charge and lands it down Kulasekara's throat at long-on  193/7

48.4  Dhoni goes after an excellent cameo, short on middle, tries to pull it away over deep square leg, gets the top edge and McGlashan runs back to take a well judged catch on the second attempt  382/4

24.2  And Jesse Ryder has got rid of the Indian captain. As he has done through this little knock, Dhoni moved down the wicket and towards off stump. As he has done all through, Ryder kept his calm and got the ball to cut in from outside off. Dhoni went for the on-the-up push-drive but got a thick inside edge. Good persistent bowling gets the result.  110/5
46.2  Dhoni falls, attempting to steal a leg bye. It moved past the hurried prod and rolled towards Ramdin. Dhoni rushed across but is caught short of the crease by direct hit from Ramdin  298/6

48.2  he moves outside leg as he charges out but Taylor slips in a slower one. Dhoni tries to lunge across to cut but misses it. The boy on the burning deck falls finally. What a fine captain's knock it has been.  188/10
26.1  The off stump has taken another beating. Angelooooo!  Another delivery that cut back in a bit, Dhoni tried to force it through the off side and got a fatal inside edge  129/6
36.3  is late into the pull shot, this short delivery climbs into him and cramps him fast, the top edge lobs to midwicket - good hand played by Dhoni  205/2

23.5  Afridi nails his man this time. He had a huge shout for lbw few balls before but Dhoni survived that. Dhoni again skipped down the track and yet again, missed the wristy dab to the on side. The ball  turned towards the middle stump and hit him low on the pad. Taufel sends Dhoni on his way. Two quick wickets and Pakistan move ahead in the contest. That's plumb. It would have taken out the middle  133/4

37.2  And Australia on the ascendancy here. Dhoni charged out for the big shot but mistimed it straight to mid-on. Lee throws the ball up in the air and Dhoni crashes his bat onto the ground. Joy and sorrow collide.  186/6

49.3  Dhoni falls after a superbly paced knock. It was a full delivery on the off stump line, he tried to whip it across the line but edged it to right of Paine who takes a tumbling catch. Dhoni gets a standing ovation from the crowd. He started off ,dealing in singles, before he turned violent in the end  352/5
31.2  Gone! It was the strangler down the leg side. It bounced outside leg and Dhoni tried to glance it but got a thin feather through to the keeper. And he walked. How vital is this?  145/5

23.3  What a catch by Voges. Superb interception at point. It was short and wide, asking to be hit , and Dhoni carved it low to right of backward point where Voges makes a stunning diving catch. Tendulkar stands alone.  162/4

30.1  and he strikes first ball! Dhoni is not happy! This is pitched within stumps, and there is no swing, hence missing the off stump, if not by much. Dhoni is not pleased with the call, but he was gone earlier, caught behind to the same bowler, but was not given  75/6

36.1  slower ball does it again, and the batting Powerplay has done it again for the fielding side. This slower delivery seemed fairly obvious from behind, but that;s not the case when you are batting, and Dhoni is drawn into a forward shot and is too late in taking the bottom hand off, the ball lobs to cover, and Sri Lanka now have a chance to save many records from falling  311/3
49.3  A tired looking Dhoni holes out to deep midwicket. He went down the track and heaved it straight to Dilshan. The crowd are up on their feet to applaud the Indian captain.  300/6

31.2  he has got him this time, the partnership stays at 99. Slightly loose shot, sees a short delivery, throws his bat at it, gets a thick outside edge - perhaps because it's too close to him - and Sangakkara takes a good diving catch to his right. What a first wicket for Perera  170/4
36.1  soft dismissal for Dhoni, he chips down the track to try and slam him over the infield but doesn't get the desired elevation, ends up chipping it to Kayes at mid-on  201/4

8.5  edged and taken! Dhoni cannot contain himself, again going for a drive to the off but this time he doesn't get to the pitch of a ball just fractionally held back on length and twirls a little nick to Sangakkara who takes it low to his left  47/4
23.1  Dhoni is gone! that is a big breakthrough, a short of length ball outside off, Dhoni seemed to be into his shot a touch early, his drive lobs towards mid-off where Albie pouches it low  138/4
27.2  what a superb effort from Boucher! looks to whip this to on side, gets a big edge and Boucher dives full length to his right to pull this off one-handed  156/4

42.2  would you believe it? what a move to bring Malik on. Full toss down the leg side, going for a wide, Dhoni tries the fine sweep, it hits the angular part of the back of the bat, and goes onto the stumps. Oh what intuition, what dismissal, Dhoni can't believe it. Game. Is. On  210/5

37.6  wicket against the run of play, and a huge one! Dhoni is run out. Tapped with soft hands straight to point, and Rohit calls Dhoni across for a tight single.. he hares down to the non-striker's end but is beaten easily by Kapugedera, swooping in from point and letting rip an arrow-throw to the non-striker's end.  189/5

32.2  Kandamby is on a roll. Not a great ball again but he gets another wicket! It was short, it was wide and Dhoni reaches out to cut it towards backward point where Kulasekara dives forward to take a good catch.  167/4

13.5  Dhoni is run out and he walks. His scratchy innings comes to an end. This one was jabbed close to the off side and he wants a single. His partner doesn't. Yuvraj took couple of steps down the track and froze. And Dhoni tries to turn back. Too late. Tuffey had already screamed past him, swooped on the ball and flicked a direct hit. Gone!  53/5

21.6  no need for an umpire here! not the smartest shot Dhoni has played either. Sanga goes back to standing back, and immediately Dhoni goes for a walk down the pitch, and looks to turn this to leg from way outside off. the ball holds its line enough to get the edge, and Sanga holds it safely. Dhoni walks  71/5

38.3  Nathan takes out Dhoni. It was a flighted delivery outside off that didn't turn in. Dhoni lunged out for the square drive and edged it behind!  Hopkins caught it on the rebound. It had popped out but he crouched quickly to take it again  199/6

46.5  And that's it. Sri Lanka have completed a crushing win. Fine spirited performance from Sri Lanka.  The end came when the Indian captain Dhoni went down the track for the big hit but ended up dragging it to his stumps. Randiv roared. Sanga, Mahela, Randiv enveloped each other with a hug. The rest of the team-mates converged.  225/10

43.6  Hastings takes two in this over, sends the off stump out of the round, kept a little low and nipped back in from a touch outside off, didn't bring his bat down in time as he attempted a cut and out went the off stump  257/5

22.5  oh, well. Dhoni has been Kallised. Or Laxmaned. It's amazing how many times this has happened in this series. Kohli times a straight drive perfectly, and Parnell just about gets a finger on it before it crashes into the stumps at the bowler's end. Kallis was stunned. Laxman was shocked. Dhoni just walks back without showing emotion.  95/5

43.1  Castled! What a night Tsotsobe is having. It was a very full delivery outside off, Dhoni tried to whip it away but the ball took the inside edge and crashed into the furniture. 4-19 for Tsotsobe!  172/6

19.5  India are slipping here, short outside off, turned in, Dhoni sensed a chance, rocked back to cut it past point, got an edge and AB fumbled it on the first attempt only to recover and clasp it in the second, South Africa hold the edge now. How will Yusuf and Raina respond?  69/4

28.4  Soft dismissal! It was a delivery outside off that stopped a touch on Dhoni who ended up checking his intended punch shot , and pushed the ball straight to short extra cover! Gone! He trudges back to the hut.  123/5

8.3  India have lost a huge wicket. The scorecard will say edged and caught at slip, but this was not an outside edge in the true sense of the word. It was short, fractionally outside off and Dhoni went for the cut. He was a little late on the shot, and it wasn't wide enough for the cut. Plus it bounced more than he anticipated. Hence the edge, it was dying on first slip who took it well. India are reeling here.  45/3
46.1  Dhoni falls now! Two in two for England. Shortish ball that Dhoni swung hard at but straight to Luke Wright at deep midwicket.  305/5

40.1  is there still a twist? Dhoni has been given out lbw by Rod Tucker, Dhoni had taken a big stride forward and was hit on the back leg, that pitched on middle and off, and was going on to hit middle and leg, there's no inside-edge either, by the time the review upheld the decision to give him out, Dhoni was nearly back in the pavilion, a day to cherish for Dockrell, getting two of the biggest names in the game, first Sachin and now Dhoni  167/5

41.4  Lovely leg break from Bishoo! Supah delivery.  It was flighted on a length on the middle and leg, Dhoni went down the track but was beaten in the flight and went on to complete that big lofted hit. No luck. The ball dipped, turned and bounced over the stumps. Thomas collected it and quietly removed the bails. The stumper is stumped.  218/4

37.3  Dhoni has perished. He's not been in great form, and clearly that's affecting his thinking. After the last two balls, you'd have expected better than a wild airy cut to a short ball. That was again pacy from Lee, got it to bounce extra and Dhoni had no control on the cut. Seemed like he wanted to hit it right through Clarke at point. Pup keeps his cool and holds a blinder as the ball buzzes away to his right. India are throwing this away.  187/5

41.4  well, that's one way to take the faulty catching out of the equation! Dhoni is rapped on the pad as he shuffles to off, huge appeal and Taufel has given him out! Dhoni wants a review though ... but it's not going to help, three reds as it pitches and hits him in line, definitely hitting the stumps and that's gone. India's hopes of making a defendable total are beginning to evaporate here  205/6
49.3  big swing from Dhoni results in a thin edge through to the keeper...a curious innings by the captain who never really got going, but he always had to be aware of a fairly long tail  272/6
20.3  Helicopter. Crash-lands in Bell's lap. This is inches short of yorker, Dhoni tries the trademark whiplash flick, is too close to the pitch of it, ends up skying it to long-on  164/5

44.1  caught! It's a low full toss and Dhoni's attempt at hitting through midwicket ends up in a scoop over the bowler's head. Cook runs to his right from mid-on and takes a simple catch. Dhoni looked restricted in his movement in these last few overs  170/6

25.2  Dhoni has holed out to long off, he has been swinging full deliveries hard from the crease, he got hold of this one alright, it flew off the middle high towards Warner, who timed his leap superbly to hold on to it  128/9

33.4  Dhoni done in by the short ball now, he was not in a good position to play the pull, but still went for it, the ball looped over Malinga at wide mid on, and he took a good catch running back  167/5

37.2  now even 230 looks like a mirage for India, short delivery again and on the body, Dhoni tries to pull that in front of square on the on side, ends up finding Christian at midwicket, it appeared like a slower ball  149/7

32.5  Dhoni's gone, this time Mr. Cool's tactics haven't worked. He hasn't lasted long enough to make up for a slow start, and boy was the start slow.. Hilfenhaus slipped a quick length ball straight past Dhoni, who was trapped on the crease as he looked to work to leg. He misses the shot and it struck plumb in front.  126/7

49.2  he's played that shot well this innings and he struck that one hard too, but the whiplash fails to clear long-off this time, Thirimanne, standing there, moves back a few steps and takes it over his head  307/6
14.1  Dhoni walks! A bit too close to cut, Mathews cramps him up for room, attempts to bash that past point and Sangakkara catches the edge, no doubts about that one  60/5

40.4  126 kph, and that just may be the final death knell as Dhoni plays inside of a delivery shaping in and gets his off stump knocked back. Mushfiq takes a lovely catch, letting the ball turn and deflect and taking it almost behind his body, and then screams in Dhoni's face  128/5

Mustafizur comes in from the rope and dives forward to take this inches form the ground  268/5

Dhoni fails to see India through, they need seven off two balls.  297/6

28.4  MS is run-out. Total breakdown in communication between the pair. Tossed up outside off, Dhoni comes down and misses his flick. The ball ricochets away towards cover off the pad. MS looks at Kohli, Kohli thinks and thinks and thinks. In the meantime, Dhoni is waiting in the middle of the pitch for conformation. Gets a negative response from Kohli, but way too late, especially because Guptill is quick to the ball. Lobs the ball back to the keeper with Dhoni stranded mid-pitch. Kohli is distraught with his decision.  162/4

39.3  that is a sensational catch, a little like how Shane Bond caught Cameron White in New Zealand many years ago! Dhoni pushed at the ball a bit too early and it came right back down the pitch, in the air but it was dying as it approached the bowler. Southee was moving towards his left in the follow through but he stopped and dived to his right to scoop the ball with one hand inches before it was going to bounce. So Dhoni will not take this game deep, someone else has to try and finish it for India. New Zealand edge ahead in this tense chase.  172/6

And it is precisely for this reason that they like it - some hold onto the dry pitch and if a batsman is driving on the up, there is every chance he could be caught. That's why they have a short cover in the 36th over. Dhoni was left reaching for the ball, mistimes the shot and Taylor takes the catch  192/3

Seam-up, Dhoni doesn't move his feet, drives at the ball but the ball finds a way through the bat and pad gap to clatter into leg stump. A big play from Neesham. May have got that to seam back in just enough.  135/4

13.3  taken by the deep square leg fielder. Dhoni's gone! The leg trap, the short ball trap was set and it's been sprung! There's a quick check for the no-ball. And Hasan's fine. This time though, he top edges to Imad, running in and diving foward. Hasan pulls out his trademark celebration, the pretend smoke bomb onto the pitch and as the smoke clears he is there, arms spread wide, looking like a proper hero.  54/5
